reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Improving China's protection of intellectual property rights, including its copyright collective licensing system.

description.narrative: The project is designed to improve China's copyright collective licensing system and improve UK-China cooperation on dispute resolution. It is intended that, by January 2018, better resolution of disputes results in Chinese judges' increased awareness and consequent policy input to ongoing copyright reforms, thereby leading to higher revenues for Chinese and international creative industries companies (including UK ones) and individual creators.
